mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_membership (membername, membersex, membercardid, memberidcard, memberphone, memberlevel, memberapply) values (#{membername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{membersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{membercardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberidcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.update: update tb_membership set membername = #{membername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, membersex = #{membersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, membercardid = #{membercardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memberidcard = #{memberidcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memberphone = #{memberphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memberlevel = #{memberlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, membername, membersex, membercardid, memberidcard, memberphone, memberlevel, memberapply from tb_membership where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, membername, membersex, membercardid, memberidcard, memberphone, memberlevel, DATE_FORMAT(memberapply, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as memberapply from tb_membership
